execution_plan.description: Compute count of distinct products per order and keep only orders with at least two distinct products.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Order_Items.order_id AS s1__order_id, COUNT(DISTINCT Order_Items.product_id) AS s1__product_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY Order_Items.order_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Order_Items.product_id) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve order dates for the orders that have at least two products using the filtered order ids from step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Orders.order_id AS s2__order_id, Orders.date_order_placed AS s2__date_order_placed FROM Orders WHERE Orders.order_id IN ($step1.s1__order_id);
